gutes game

Jogo muito bom!
Killers e sobreviventes extremamente divertidos de serem jogados. Ótimos killer e sobreviventes grátis como a Claudette(Sobrevivente) e a Nurse (Killer) então você não precisa comprar nenhuma das dlc's para se divertir,por exemplo eu,tenho mais de 200 horas no game e nunca comprei nada,e mesmo assim o jogo não perdeu a graça!
O único problema que realmente incomoda as vezes são os bugs de hitbox,que devem ser os principais assassinos do game haha! Muitas vezes a hitbox na janela fica extremamente grande e vc acaba levando um hit e ate mesmo morrendo,mas fora isso o jogo é muito bom.
Nota: 8,5/10

Dead by Daylight is a charming 4V1 multiplayer game that I keep coming back to. Do I come back because of its flawless design? No! Do I come back for how well balanced it is? No! Do I come back because I can quickly hop in game because wait times are so small? No! The game is jank, unbalanced, and the wait times can be unbearable. However, playing with friends in such a janky environment yields some of the greatest times you could ever have....







Also, they seriously need to nerf Michael Myers...

Das Spiel ist eigentlich ganz gut und es macht auch mega Spaß sowohl als Killer als auch als Survivor. Das einzige Problem an dem Spiel ist die viel zu toxische Community die z.B. den Killer flamen wenn man mal 10 Sekunden am Haken stehenbleibt und man dann direkt als ,,Campernoob'' bezeichnet wird. Wer dieses Rumgeheule von solchen kleinen Kindern aushält denen wir das Spiel bestimmt Spaß machen, ich persönlich finde sowas einfach nur lächerlich.

Easily one of the best asymmetrical survival horror games out there-if not the already the best-and anybody who has played games akin to Friday the 13th, & Last Year: The Nightmare, needs to try this out; if you haven't bought this game yet, I'd be surprised.

I love this game, though I admit it's not perfect. For starters, the ranking system is broken. Players that reach red ranks don't earn their place with skill, just luck. There are definitely some amazing players up there but don't beat yourself up if you're struggling to simply get purple ranks. Another thing that may taint your experience is the hackers and trolls lurking in the player-base. The community is pretty good at ratting these buggers out, even in-game (I've seen survivors and killers team up on 'em, which is funny karma). The game does have an accessible report button so remember that if you encounter a player that is disrupting the game.

This game does have DLCs, most of their content is pretty good (the "legion" and the "nightmare" being the worst, despite Freddy getting a rework). Don't force yourself to buy new survivors and killers, the default characters you are given for free will keep you satisfied.

Overall, this is a fun game. I have a lot of fond memories that were born here, and you may make new friends. I really do recommend everyone, who is interested, to buy this game.

Tek kelimeyle mükemmel bir oyun. Arkadaşlarımla beraber oynamak için almıştım ama tek başıma oynarken de gayette zevkli. Katil ve kurban olarak oynamanın çok ayrı eğlenceleri var. Birisiyle insanları bulmanın verdiği hazzı ve gücü hissederken diğerinde katili deli etmek ya da onunla oynamak (tabii oynayabilirseniz) çok eğlenceli. Oyun içerisinde hareketlerinizi dikkatli yapmanız ve bir sonraki hamleyi tahmin etmeniz sizi başarıya götürür. Karakterler DLC'ler ile geliyor ve gerçek para ya da lisanslı olmayan kurban ve katilleri oyun parasıyla alabilirsiniz. Tabii ki lisanslı katilleri örneğin Micheal Myers, Ghost Face gibi karakterleri ise sadece gerçek para ile alabiliyorsunuz. Ama hem oyunun hem de DLC'lerin kuruşu kuruşuna değdiğini düşünüyorum.

It's very fun and it helps by teaching to concentrate on sounds and surroundings. There are in fact a few toxic players but for me, the most players I played with were very fun and cool to play with. 
Even if You are overwhelmed at first, You can quickly adjust to the game.

If You are interested in such games, it's definitively worth a shot.
